results.title: Metformin inhibits the activation of melanocortin receptors 2 and 3 in vitro: A possible mechanism for its anti-androgenic and weight balancing effects in vivo?
results.text_hl: Our study may explain how @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ helps in @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ and attenuates the excess response to @GENE_POMC @GENE_5443 @@@ACTH@@@ in androgen excess disorders such as @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Hyperplasia_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000312 @@@CAH@@@.

citations.NLM: Parween S, Rihs S, Flück CE. Metformin inhibits the activation of melanocortin receptors 2 and 3 in vitro: A possible mechanism for its anti-androgenic and weight balancing effects in vivo? J Steroid Biochem Mol Biol. 2020 Jun;200():105684. PMID: 32360359
citations.BibTeX: @article{32360359, title={Metformin inhibits the activation of melanocortin receptors 2 and 3 in vitro: A possible mechanism for its anti-androgenic and weight balancing effects in vivo?}, author={Parween S and Rihs S and Flück CE}, journal={J Steroid Biochem Mol Biol}, volume={200}, pages={105684}}

results.title: Metformin-responsive classic salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency: a case report.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-responsive classic @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Hyperplasia_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000312 @@@salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia@@@ due to @DISEASE_Congenital_adrenal_hyperplasia_due_to_21_hydroxylase_deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:C535979 @@@21-hydroxylase deficiency@@@: a case report.

citations.NLM: Mapas-Dimaya AC, Agdere L, Bahtiyar G, Mejia JO, Sacerdote AS. Metformin-responsive classic salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency: a case report. Endocr Pract. 2008 Oct;14(7):889-91. PMID: 18996819
